title: Decorative Blackletter
content:
does anyone know the name of the typeface this letter A hat is using?

Font: 

 Celebration Text Fancy 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114915/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [BlackLetterAlife.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114915/http:/typophile.com/files/BlackLetterAlife.png) | 101.06 KB |
author: Sullivan0

comments.content: **CelebrationTextFancy** digitized by Dan X. Solo. (1998 by Dover Publications) is close enough and of good quality.
